column4: HELLO!! can anyone explain to me why when i go to a tty my lcd screen turns off? also I don't get anything on my screen until I'm at the gdm login.
not getting anything in gdm login screen - what do you mean
I had similar problem (blank screen) after installing restricted nvidia drivers. There are a lot threads in google. some options/lines in xorg.conf file could help
I am with laptop, ubuntu gutsy
